name: Wretchedness The Infernal Hell Loop
description:
Wretchedness The Infernal Hell Loop

Oh no! Sadly, you have died because you keep watching cat videos on your phone while driving. Such shame...but a least that last video made you laugh. 

So now you are stuck on hell, too bad. This place is literally hell, I doubt you will finish it, mostly because of the poor controls and movement, but if you do there's a nice reward at the end. You have to keep pushing forward till you reach the end and maybe you might be able to get out.  Maybe...

 

P.S. This game was made for GameDevTv  Game Jam 2022 (first one)   Here is a list of all the assets I used for this game, if you see your assets but I did not make a mention please let me know and I would gladly give you credit for your awesome assets. 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/obstacle-course-pack-17816...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/angels-demons-free-42583

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/cartoon-low-poly-city-pack-lite-166617
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-free-103633
